mdRecord.dcterms:title: Flagpole base, close view,
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Blair, Walter Dabney (American architect, 1877-1953) [work]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The flag poles came about from legislation that provided funding for all state agencies to buy a pair or a second flag pole(s) to fly the Commonwealth flag on its own pole and at an equal height as the US flag rather than below the US flag as when only a single flagpole is available. -- Garth Anderson, Facilities Historian, UVA [work]
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: James Murray Howard University of Virginia Historic Buildings and Grounds Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Sculpture and Installations
flagpoles
